medical_history.chief_complaint: HIV-associated lipodystrophy and body fat maldistribution, including bilateral facial wasting and increased fat deposition.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was diagnosed with HIV in 1994 and developed hyperlipidemia and body fat maldistribution over recent years. The fat accumulation became psychologically distressing and affected his medication adherence, prompting him to seek liposuction.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV infection diagnosed in 1994; developed hyperlipidemia; previous surgeries for fat removal.
medical_history.social_history: The patient follows a primarily vegetarian South Asian diet, exercises regularly, and is active in running. He is involved with the Gay and Lesbian Advocates and Defenders (GLAD).
